text: Zvino akanga agadzira pokumira pakakwirira nendarira, pakanga pakareba makubhiti mashanu6:13 mamita angaita 2.3, pane upamhi hwamakubhiti mashanu uye pakakwirira makubhiti matatu6:13 mamita angaita 1.4, uye akanga apaisa pakati pechivanze chokunze. Akamira pokumira paya akapfugama pamberi peungano yose yaIsraeri akatambanudzira maoko ake kudenga.
